model

Class FileManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.FileManagement

  • public class FileManagement
extends java.lang.Object
    Class handling logic related to input from Run-Length Encoding files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      FileManagement()

      static java.io.File loadFileFromDisk()
      Finds a local .rle file through user interaction with FileChooser.

      Create an inputStream from a URL specified by the user in an inputDialog.
      static int readDimension(java.lang.String inputString)
      Takes a String containing board dimension data from the loaded .rle file, isolates it and returns it as int.

      Returns the data located in .rle file broken up into separate strings ready for application or further manipulation.
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Byte>> readPatternDynamicBoard(java.lang.String patternString, int height, int width)
      Converts a string containing cell pattern from the loaded .rle file into a two-dimensional list that represents the cell pattern.

      Converts a string containing cell pattern from the loaded .rle file into a two-dimensional byte array that represents the cell pattern.
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Byte>> readRules(java.lang.String rulesString)
      Takes a String containing rule data from the loaded .rle file, identifies birth and survival rules and returns them in lists.

      • readFile

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> readFile(java.io.Reader r,
                                                                            java.lang.String absoluteFilePath)
                                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the data located in .rle file broken up into separate strings ready for application or further manipulation.
        Parameters:
        r - the reader object created from local file or URL
        Returns:
        hashmap of strings containing atomic data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the reader input is corrupted

      • readDimension

        public static int readDimension(java.lang.String inputString)
        Takes a String containing board dimension data from the loaded .rle file, isolates it and returns it as int.
        Parameters:
        inputString - a String describing the width or height data
        Returns:
        dimension as int

      • readRules

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Byte>> readRules(java.lang.String rulesString)
        Takes a String containing rule data from the loaded .rle file, identifies birth and survival rules and returns them in lists.
        Parameters:
        rulesString - a String describing rule data.
        Returns:
        wrapper ArrayList containing the two LinkedLists of rules

      • readPatternStaticBoard

        public static byte[][] readPatternStaticBoard(java.lang.String patternString,
                                              int height,
                                              int width)
        Converts a string containing cell pattern from the loaded .rle file into a two-dimensional byte array that represents the cell pattern.
        Parameters:
        patternString - a String of cell pattern data
        width - width of the pattern. Determines size of first dimension of array
        height - height of the pattern. Determines size of second dimension of array
        Returns:
        two dimensional byte array where value 0 represents a dead cell and value 1 represents a live cell.

      • readPatternDynamicBoard

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Byte>> readPatternDynamicBoard(java.lang.String patternString,
                                                                                               int height,
                                                                                               int width)
                                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Converts a string containing cell pattern from the loaded .rle file into a two-dimensional list that represents the cell pattern.
        Parameters:
        patternString - a String of cell pattern data.
        width - width of the pattern
        height - height of the pattern
        Returns:
        two dimensional ArrayList where value 0 represents a dead cell and value 1 represents a live cell.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
